backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, PDF storage, and Dropbox token with access control and sorted PDF queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with routing, Internet Identity initialization timeout/error handling, profile setup, and layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user lacks permission, offering navigation back home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitSta: Dismissible warning/error banner for slow or failed authentication initialization with optional reload.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Route guard that checks admin status and displays loading or access-denied screens accordingly.
frontend/src/components/checklist/Checkl: Renders a titled checklist section with optional description and a content area separated by a divider.
frontend/src/components/checklist/YesNoF: Provides a labeled yes/no radio field component for checklist inputs.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays footer with current year and a link to caffeine.ai including app identifier tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements the app header with navigation, login/logout handling, and admin access button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, identity loading, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, admin check, and Dropbox token management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark theme styling.
frontend/src/lib/checklist/defaults.ts: Returns the default initial data structure for all checklist sections and fields.
frontend/src/lib/checklist/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types describing the full checklist form data structure.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/downloadPdf.ts: Creates and triggers a mobile‑safe PDF download and provides utilities for safe ObjectURL revocation.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/filename.ts: Generates a sanitized PDF filename from a room number.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/generateChecklistPd: Generates a simple text-based PDF from checklist data and returns it as encoded bytes.
frontend/src/lib/upload/uploadChecklistP: Uploads PDF bytes to Dropbox using an API token retrieved from backend; token retrieval is currently unimplemented.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSettingsPage.tsx: Admin UI for viewing and updating the Dropbox access token with save status and validation.
frontend/src/pages/ChecklistFormPage.tsx: Checklist form that generates a PDF, downloads it, and optionally uploads it to Dropbox if configured.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state and requirements for a web app that recreates a two‑page checklist as a fillable form, generates and uploads PDFs, and lists current issues with PDF downloads and app loading.
